column4: I am thinking about installing ubunto server, and wandering (to get a gui) if i put in the command "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop" can i subsitute "xubunto" to get the x desktop (and is this just the lite desktop, no apps?)?
Yes, "sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop" will get you the xfce desktop, it's a nice and light desktop :)
It is my opinion that a new user can greatly benefit from learning how to do things from the command line.
